籤詩版本二:
Isigaxa sehlathi sicela isiphethu.Kunzima kakhulu ukufuna umsebenzi onzima.
Ngezinye izikhathi, ngivele ngihlangane nomngane wami omkhulu futhi ngiye esibhakabhakeni sibambene ngesandla.
詩意:
Lo mhlabathi we-hexagram cone ufuna isithombe sentwasahlobo.
Konke kunzima ngaphambi kokuba kube lula kamuva.
解曰: Izifiso nemicabango. I-West iyatholakala. Kungcono unganyakazi. Kukhona indawo etholakalayo.
籤詩故事一:
◇ULiu Chen uhlangana nokungafi
EMpumalanga Han, uLiu Chen noRuan Zhaoguo baya ezintabeni ukuyoqoqa amakhambi futhi bahlangana nezinganekwane ezimbili.
Laba bobabili bashada nedlozi babuyela ekhaya ngemva kwesigamu sonyaka, babengazi ukuthi kwase kudlule iminyaka eyikhulu babuyela ekhaya.
Akekho owabazi, ngakho babuyela ezintabeni ukuyobheka inganekwane, kodwa abayitholanga.
聖意: Thandazela izibusiso emzini wakho nekhaya lakho, ukuze kuzuze wena, inzuzo yemali, ukuthengiselana, umshado, ukuphepha eLiujia, abantu baseChitian, ukutshalwa kokuqala kwemibungu kasilika, ukulimala kwemfuyo, ukuthola abantu, umphakathi. ukumangalelwa, ukufuduka, impahla elahlekile, izifo, inhlanhla emathuneni e-Xingxing Mountain,
